intro: Bark and Clap in Signed, Sealed & Delivered! A cozy puzzle game where ocean critters help you to deliver the mail.
description:
Take on the role of Delivery Seal and deliver letters and parcels across fantastical ocean worlds! Navigating the seas can be hard, good thing there is always someone to ask for help. Explore and interact with other sea creatures, who will help you traverse the terrain and bring the mail to your eagerly awaiting friends. You’ll learn more about the locals as they read the letters they’ve been waiting for, and then deliver new letters to their underseas relatives! Each world features increasingly complex puzzles, introducing new critters to befriend and environments to navigate to reach the next mailbox.

Who will you meet? What package will you deliver next?

Game Features:

- Simple to play: Bark and Clap at sea critters to communicate, and use their help to navigate the seas!
- Power up by learning: Understanding how the critters will respond helps you solve puzzles and find secrets!
- Face challenges at your own pace: Relax and explore handcrafted levels that reward clever thinking.
- Collect to customize: Collect the hidden stamps and customize your seal with a variety of colours and cool hats!
- A wholesome puzzle adventure where friendship is delivered straight to your doorstep.
